A black shadow of pure hatred and strife hangs menacing over the 
entitey known as Earth as the great black ship Chaoz comes into 
view.  As it rounds the corner into the atmosphere it blinks as if 
smiling and a laugh ecos thorughout the corerdors as a pod is 
launched into the atmosphere, as the pure evil being known as Auorn 
rushes toward the unsuspecting population he smiles at the brillance 
of his plan as the great ship Chaoz turns off and heads in the 
direction it has come. AS the pod crashes into a rejion of Earth with 
a menacing crash and a explosion that can be sensed for miles 
around, "Yes I am here fianlly to reak my havok on this planet" as he 
sends out his sensors to find him a worthy mode of transporatation 
that the bots refer to as a beast mode. AS it comes over the two 
enemies locked in combat it senses then and fin\ds there bodies as 
one sutible for his purpese. As the statis field finally goes off and 
the form of Auron steps out with a long black claw into the 
ground, "Yes this will do nicely" he said when he turned into the 
half Dragon half lion mode which would suit him. As Auron laughs 
within his new bodie he launches into the air waiting for his first 
challenge.
